about.title: I am Myeongkyu Jeon.
about.description: Hello, my name is Myeongkyu Jeon. I majored in English Language and Literature and Japanese Language and Literature at Chung-Ang University. I worked as an English instructor for 2 years. After that, I served in the Air Force as an officer for 3 years and 3 months and was honorably discharged as a first lieutenant. After my service, I started programming through government-supported education and operated my personal development site for two years. Later, I completed KT's big data education program called 'Able School' and currently work as a full-stack engineer at KT's affiliate, KT cs. While I have mainly focused on backend and frontend development, I aim to continuously grow as a developer by applying various technologies like machine learning/deep learning, CI/CD, and blockchain to my projects.

experiences.title: Full-Stack Engineer
experiences.subtitle: KT cs
works: Developed a stable and scalable backend system using the Spring Framework
Implemented a dynamic frontend considering user experience with React
Designed an efficient user interface using Thymeleaf and jQuery

experiences.title: AI Engineer Trainee
experiences.subtitle: KT Aivle School
works: Developed personalized voice services using TTS and RVC AI modeling
Integrated backend and frontend, and managed overall code quality through reviews
Designed and developed frontend and backend systems with Django and Bootstrap
Managed project schedules and team leadership using Jira

experiences.title: Base Company Commander/Operations Control Officer
experiences.subtitle: Republic of Korea Air Force
works: Managed comprehensive operations, including the management of weapons and ammunition supplies
Supervised training and management of a large number of personnel
Facilitated smooth communication and collaboration between units and headquarters through shift work

experiences.title: Full-Time Instructor
experiences.subtitle: Messi
works: Delivered various English lectures, including school exams, SAT, and TEPS, contributing to improved student performance
Prepared detailed lesson plans and materials for effective teaching
Created customized learning environments by developing proprietary textbooks and materials

projects.title: My Dictionary
projects.description: This is the first website I created after starting development. It is a website where words can be saved to a database through a Chrome extension and studied. Spring Data JPA and Spring Security were utilized. Due to copyright issues, it has not been deployed. In the future, I plan to build an AI-based API server to provide services through extensions and apps.

projects.title: My Study Materials
projects.description: This is a website I created to systematically organize my personal study materials. It primarily organizes Linux learning materials and was operated as a service on AWS for half a year. Currently, the service has been discontinued, and I plan to replace this functionality with a language learning app in the future.

projects.title: mogumogu's sundries
projects.description: This is a blog I created using React and Next.js to replace my WordPress blog, which had limited customization options. It supports multiple languages and markdown writing. Originally deployed through Vercel, but after adding automated features for crawling, summarizing, and translating Hacker News, it is now deployed on AWS.

projects.title: mogumogu's docs
projects.description: This is a site where I compile development reference documents in one place. Previously, I translated official documents using documentation tools and deployed them, but I plan to replace this functionality with a language learning app in the future.
